title: Among all the backlash you're getting, Riot, I really like the new shop SFX
body: Seriously, the new SFX for when you enter the shop are really good. They're small and soft, but it really gives off an 'in a shop' feeling. Sounds like a small chime you hear when you enter a bridal shop. It's little things that add up to the experience.
